content: Quote from:   ➥ Fast / Secure Cryptocurrency Exchange [EXC24 Home] & [For Support]  &  [EXC24 FAQ] & [EXC24 on Trustpilot] Welcome to our thread dedicated to a new crypto-exchange - EXC24. We are a small team (just 3 people) who saw the need to create a convenient and fast cryptocurrency exchange service. After internal tests, we are excited to present our product to you  Roll Eyes. We will be very grateful for any feedback and recommendations to improve our service. We are just at the beginning of the journey and are open to any suggestions!Fast and automatic exchangeWe offer automatic exchange of hundreds (over 350) coins in 24/7 mode. This means you have the opportunity to exchange more than 100k pairs of coins. We strive to provide a fast and reliable automatic exchange service, where most transactions are completed in 2 - 20 minutes, depending on the network speed of the selected coins, which means you'll get your desired cryptocurrency quickly.Around-the-clock operationWe work around the clock, without breaks or weekends to provide accessibility and convenience to our customers all over the world. Now you can exchange coins at any time convenient for you. Our team is always on call, 24/7, (we have live support operators ready to help you with any questions or problems).Step 1/2Choose an exchange option - floating or fixed. Floating - the price will be at the current market, may fluctuate. Fixed - you will receive exactly the amount that you fixed at the time of the exchange. Choose the coin you want to exchange and the coin you want to receive it for and set the amount (a very wide selection of cryptocurrency pairs).Data entry and verification. Enter the necessary details for the exchange, such as the wallet address, memo, and networks for the exchange. Verify the entered data before confirming the transaction!Tips/TricksAfter completing the exchange, you will have the opportunity to check the status of your transaction on our crypto exchange or on the blockchain of the corresponding coin. This will help you keep track of the process.We have set minimum amount for each exchange (just 20 usd for many coins). Before starting the transaction, make sure that your amount meets our requirements. This will help avoid errors and delays.___________________________Thank you for visiting our thread! If you have any questions or need assistance, feel free to contact our live support operator. We hope that our crypto-exchanger will become a reliable and convenient tool for your coin exchange operations. We are always ready to help you achieve your financial goals!

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: How can we trust you that you will not go away with someone's money? Because we would send first, the money will be with you first. The second is that if you want to market your products and services on this forum, you can get yourself a signature campaign manager to advertise your company on this forum.Instant exchanges are good once it is trusted, but if new and not yet trustworthy, it can be a way to scam people. comments.author: EXC24
comments.body: Quote from: rat03gopoh on June 19, 2023, 03:17:06 PMI saw "no limits to exchange" on the first page, but on the other hand you're imposing limits, does that interpret things differently? (I mean you know, sometimes device performance gets out of control).You are right, we have no maximum limits now. I removed this information from the topic. We don't have our limits. All minimum amounts are set by exchange networks. We meant that you are not limited in your ability to change coins anywhere and anytime About exchange ID - our service is completely anonymous, so there is no way for us to associate your device with the ID of the created ticket. But when creating an exchange, a separate page is created containing the ID in the link. You can find this link in your browser history. And one more thing - if you have already created an exchange and paid, your money will not go anywhere anyway. You can always write to us and we will find your exchange in the database.In the future, we will add a personal account and users will be able to save and track their transactions.

comments.author: EXC24
comments.body: Today we had our first exchange from a stranger. I would like to believe that it was just a client, but it turned out to be more interesting Man from Poland created 2 identical orders with a difference of 2 seconds on different devices. In this case, we do not make an automatic exchange, and the operator performs the exchange in manual mode. As a result, we made a manual payment for one of the orders.During the processing of this order, we found 3 things that are worth improving in our work. Thank you stranger!

comments.author: Etranger
comments.body: I visited your site, and I can immediately say that I liked the site itself, it is made intuitively and logically. I also liked the quite large number of cryptocurrencies to exchange. But just in connection with this, I had a question. I don’t quite understand why someone should use your exchanger and not an exchange, where you can place maker orders and thus get a more favorable rate? Just because it can be faster with your service, or because some exchanges require identification and people want to avoid it?I can also say that I resort to the services of an exchanger when I want to exchange cryptocurrency for fiat. But I have not seen such currency pairs on your site. Are they planned to be added, at least UAH and USD?

The user only needs to enter the desired wallet and transfer funds. As you noticed, we have a lot of coins and it is possible to change any pairs. On exchanges, it is not always possible to exchange directly, plus registration and identity confirmation are required.Another important advantage is the minimum exchange limit. On many pairs, you can exchange from 0.0006 BTC, which is only 20 dollars (for example, BTC -> MATIC, and much more). Many exchangers do not consider it necessary to bother with such amounts.In the future, we will definitely add fiat. This is a rather complex and lengthy process.
